case = int(input())
for _ in range(case):
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    zero = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if s[i] == '0':
            zero += 1
    if zero == n:
        print(n)
        continue
    negative = False
    zero = False
    positive = False
    res = 0
    znum = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if s[i] == '-':
            if zero and positive and (znum & 1 == 1):
                res += 1
            negative = True
            positive = False
            zero = False
            znum = 0
        if s[i] == '0':
            zero = True
            znum += 1
        if s[i] == '+':
            if zero and negative and (znum & 1 == 1):
                res += 1
            positive = True
            negative = False
            zero = False
            znum = 0
    print(res)

import re
for i in range(int(input())):
    l = int(input())
    N = input()
    if '+' not in N and '-' not in N:
        print(l)
    else:
        r1 = re.findall('\\+(00)*0\\-', N)
        r2 = re.findall('\\-(00)*0\\+', N)
        rt = len(r1) + len(r2)
        print(rt)

from collections import Counter
a = int(input())
for _ in range(a):
    y = int(input())
    b = input()
    g = False
    e = False
    t = False
    p = False
    co = 0
    m = 0
    l = Counter(b)
    if l['0'] == len(b):
        print(len(b))
    else:
        for i in b:
            if i == '-' and g == True and (p == True):
                p = False
                g = False
                e = True
                if m % 2 == 1:
                    co += 1
                m = 0
            elif i == '+' and e == True and (p == True):
                p = False
                e = False
                g = True
                if m % 2 == 1:
                    co += 1
                m = 0
            elif i == '+':
                g = True
                e = False
                p = False
                m = 0
            elif i == '0':
                p = True
                m += 1
            elif i == '-':
                e = True
                g = False
                p = False
                m = 0
        print(co)

t = int(input())
while t:
    n = int(input())
    li = input()
    prev = 0
    lastzero = -1
    prev = '0'
    ans = 0
    zeroes = 0
    zerocount = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if li[i] == '+' or li[i] == '-':
            if prev == '0':
                prev = li[i]
                previndex = i
                zeroes = 0
            elif prev == li[i]:
                previndex = i
                zeroes = 0
            else:
                if zeroes % 2 == 1:
                    ans += 1
                prev = li[i]
                previndex = i
                zeroes = 0
        else:
            zerocount += 1
            zeroes += 1
            lastzero = i
    if zerocount == n:
        print(n)
    else:
        print(ans)
    t -= 1

k = int(input())
for i in range(k):
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    p = 0
    n = 0
    c = 0
    neu = 0
    f = 0
    for v in s:
        if v == '+':
            if n == 1 and c > 0 and (c % 2 == 1):
                neu += 1
            n = 0
            p = 1
            c = 0
            f = 1
        if v == '-':
            if p == 1 and c > 0 and (c % 2 == 1):
                neu += 1
            n = 1
            p = 0
            c = 0
            f = 1
        if v == '0':
            c += 1
    if f == 0:
        neu += c
    print(neu)
